project.title: Vector Space
project.description: !format Created during a self-imposed weekend game jam, **Vect0r Space** was originally designed as a vehicle for teaching game programming concepts. Following positive initial reactions, the game will likely see further development and use as an educational tool.
project.feature: Simple mechanic-driven design for systems and enemies
Instructional material regarding implementation of core systems
Stylized, minimalist graphical style created entirely in engine
